segments.text: Wait, is that water coming out of the sink like a waterfall?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the faucet to be running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, but she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy climbing a stool to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to topple over!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand while grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the little girl is reaching up for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window is so serene compared to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a simple kitchen could have so much going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading fast; this is wild.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How has no one noticed yet?
segments.speaker: PAR
